Rulings.HAT:
● If the target for this card's ① leaves the field, this card remains in the hand.
● If this card is destroyed at the same time as the monster it's equipped to, this card's ③ will trigger.
● If the monster it's equipped to leaves the field, and this card leaves the field as a result, this card's ③ will not trigger.

PSCT.Vegas:
① You can target 1 face-up "Inzektor" monster you control; equip this card from your hand to that target. 
② While this card is equipped to a monster, that monster's original ATK becomes 2400.
③ If this card is sent to the GY while equipped to a monster: You can target 1 "Inzektor" monster in your GY (except "Inzektor Giga-Mantis"); Special Summon it. 
(You can only use this effect of "Inzektor Giga-Mantis" once per turn).
